About.title: About
About.funkwhaleHeader: A social platform to enjoy and share music
About.funkwhaleDescription: Funkwhale is a community-driven project that lets you listen and share music and audio within a decentralized, open network.
About.signupDescription: Sign up now to keep a track of your favorites, create playlists, discover new content and much more!
About.quotaDescription: Users on this pod also get {quota} of free storage to upload their own content!
About.registrationsClosedHelp: Registrations are closed on this pod. You can signup on another pod using the link below.
About.hoursOfMusic: {hours} hour of music | {hours} hours of music
About.publicContentDescription: Listen to public albums and playlists shared on this pod.
About.findAppDescription: Use Funkwhale on other devices with our apps.

AboutPod.title: About
AboutPod.hoursOfMusic: {hours} hour of music | {hours} hours of music

Home.title: Home
Home.hoursOfMusic: {hours} hour of music | {hours} hours of music
Home.funkwhaleDescription: This pod runs Funkwhale, a community-driven project that lets you listen and share music and audio within a decentralized, open network.
Home.funkwhaleAddendum: Funkwhale is free and developed by a friendly community of volunteers.
Home.signupDescription: Sign up now to keep a track of your favorites, create playlists, discover new content and much more!
Home.uploadQuota: Users on this pod also get {quota} of free storage to upload their own content!
Home.registrationsClosed: Registrations are closed on this pod. You can signup on another pod using the link below.
Home.publicContentDescription: Listen to public albums and playlists shared on this pod.
Home.mobileAppsDescription: Use Funkwhale on other devices with our apps
Home.userGuidesDescription: Discover everything you need to know about Funkwhale and its features

PageNotFound.title: Page not found
PageNotFound.pageNotFoundMessage: Sorry, the page you asked for does not exist:

Queue.automaticPlay: The next track will play automatically in a few seconds…
Queue.connectivityWarning: You may have a connectivity issue.
Queue.appendTracks: New tracks will be appended here automatically.

RemoteSearchForm.subscribeRss: Subscribe to a podcast RSS feed
RemoteSearchForm.subscribeFediverse: Subscribe to a podcast hosted on the Fediverse
RemoteSearchForm.rssDescription: Use this form to subscribe to an RSS feed from its URL.
RemoteSearchForm.fediverseDescription: Use this form to subscribe to a channel hosted somewhere else on the Fediverse.
RemoteSearchForm.unsupportedObject: This kind of object isn't supported yet

SetInstanceModal.currentUrl: You are now using the Funkwhale instance at {url}
SetInstanceModal.connectionFailure: It is not possible to connect to the given URL
SetInstanceModal.notFunkwhaleServer: The given address is not a Funkwhale server
SetInstanceModal.currentConnection: You are currently connected to {hostName} . If you continue, you will be disconnected from your current instance and all your local data will be deleted.
SetInstanceModal.selectFunkwhalePod: To continue, please select the Funkwhale instance you want to connect to. Enter the address directly, or select one of the suggested choices.

SignupFormBuilder.helpTextMessage: An optional text to be displayed at the start of the sign-up form.
SignupFormBuilder.additionalFieldsMessage: Additional form fields to be displayed in the form. Only shown if manual sign-up validation is enabled.

ChannelEntries.emptyMessage: You may need to subscribe to this channel to see its content.

ChannelForm.podcastsHelpText: Host your episodes and keep your community updated.
ChannelForm.discographyHelpText: Publish music you make as a nice discography of albums and singles.
ChannelForm.channelPurposeLegend: What will this channel be used for?
ChannelForm.channelUsernameDescription: Used in URLs and to follow this channel in the Fediverse. It cannot be changed later.
ChannelForm.channelPodcastFieldsHelp: Used for the itunes:email and itunes:name field required by certain platforms such as Spotify or iTunes.

ChannelSeries.emptyMessage: You may need to subscribe to this channel to see its contents.

EmbedWizard.anonymousAccessWarning: Sharing will not work because this pod doesn't allow anonymous users to access content.
EmbedWizard.anonymousAccessHelp: Please contact your admins and ask them to update the corresponding setting.
EmbedWizard.widgetWidthHelp: Leave empty for a responsive widget
EmbedWizard.embedCodeHelp: Copy/paste this code in your website HTML

PlayButton.notAvailableTitle: This track is not available in any library you have access to

Player.loopingDisabledLabel: Looping disabled. Click to switch to single-track looping.
Player.loopingSingleLabel: Looping on a single track. Click to switch to whole queue looping.
Player.loopingWholeQueueLabel: Looping on whole queue. Click to disable looping.

SearchBar.noResultsMessage: Sorry, there are no results for this search

ApplicationEdit.appDetailsDescription: Application ID and secret are really sensitive values and must be treated like passwords. Do not share those with anyone else.

ApplicationForm.redirectUrisHelp: Use "urn:ietf:wg:oauth:2.0:oob" as a redirect URI if your application is not served on the web.
ApplicationForm.scopesDescription: Checking the parent "Read" or "Write" scopes implies access to all the corresponding children scopes.

Authorize.title: Allow application
Authorize.appAccessHeader: {app_name} wants to access your Funkwhale acount
Authorize.unknownPermissionsMessage: The application is also requesting the following unknown permissions:
Authorize.copyCodeHelp: You will be shown a code to copy-past in the application
Authorize.copyCodeDescription: Copy-paste the following code in the application:

LoginForm.usernamePlaceholder: Enter your username or e-mail address
LoginForm.approvalRequiredHelp: If you signed-up recently, you may need to wait before our moderation team review your account, or verify your e-mail address.
LoginForm.invalidCredentialsHelp: Please double-check that your username and password combination is correct and make sure you verified your e-mail address.
LoginForm.redirectMessage: You will be redirected to {domain} to authenticate

Logout.title: Log out
Logout.confirmHeader: Are you sure you want to log out?
Logout.loggedInUsername: You are currently logged in as {username}

Plugin.libraryDescription: Library where files should be imported.

Settings.title: Account Settings
Settings.deletionRequest: Your deletion request was submitted, your account and content will be deleted shortly
Settings.changePasswordMessage:
Changing your password will also change your Subsonic API password if you have requested one 
 You will have to update your password on your clients that use this password.
Settings.changePasswordHelp: Please double-check your password is correct
Settings.changePasswordWarning: Changing your password will have the following consequences
Settings.changePasswordLogout: You will be logged out from this session and have to log in with the new one
Settings.changePasswordSubsonic: Your Subsonic password will be changed to a new, random one, logging you out from devices that used the old Subsonic password
Settings.contentFiltersDescription: Content filters help you hide content you don't want to see on the service.
Settings.authorizedAppsDescription: This is the list of applications that have access to your account data.
Settings.revokePermissionModalWarning: This will prevent this application from accessing the service on your behalf.
Settings.emptyAppMessage: You don't have any application connected with your account.
Settings.emptyAppHelp: If you authorize third-party applications to access your data, those applications will be listed here.
Settings.personalAppsDescription: This is the list of applications that you have registered.
Settings.deletePersonalAppModalWarning: This will permanently remove the application and all the associated tokens.
Settings.emptyPersonalAppMessage: You don't have registered any application yet.
Settings.emptyPersonalAppHelp: Register one to integrate Funkwhale with third-party applications.
Settings.pluginsDescription: Use plugins to extend Funkwhale and get additional features.
Settings.changeEmailDescription: Change the e-mail address associated with your account. We will send a confirmation to the new address.
Settings.changeEmailFailureMessage: We cannot change your e-mail address
Settings.deleteAccountDescription: You can permanently and irreversibly delete your account and all the associated data using the form below. You will be asked for confirmation.
Settings.deleteAccountWarning: Your account will be deleted from our servers within a few minutes. We will also notify other servers who may have a copy of some of your data so they can proceed to deletion. Please note that some of these servers may be offline or unwilling to comply though.
Settings.deleteAccountConfirmationMessage: Do you want to delete your acount?
Settings.deleteAccountConfirmationWarning: This is irreversible and will permanently remove your data from our servers. You will we immediatly logged out.

SignupForm.awaitingReviewMessage: Your account request was successfully submitted. You will be notified by e-mail when our moderation team has reviewed your request.
SignupForm.accountCreationSuccessMessage: Your account was successfully created. Please verify your e-mail address before trying to login.
SignupForm.loginHeader: Log in to your Funkwhale account
SignupForm.registrationClosedMessage: Public registrations are not possible on this instance. You will need an invitation code to sign up.
SignupForm.requiresReviewMessage: Registrations on this pod are open, but reviewed by moderators before approval.

SubsonicTokenForm.unavailableMessage: The Subsonic API is not available on this Funkwhale instance.
SubsonicTokenForm.subsonicApiDescription:
Funkwhale is compatible with other music players that support the Subsonic API.
 You can use those to enjoy your playlist and music in offline mode, on your smartphone or tablet, for instance.
SubsonicTokenForm.subsonicPasswordInfo: However, accessing Funkwhale from those clients requires a separate password you can set below.
SubsonicTokenForm.appsLink: Discover how to use Funkwhale from other apps
SubsonicTokenForm.requestNewTokenModalHeader: Request a new Subsonic API password?
SubsonicTokenForm.requestNewTokenWarning: This will log you out from existing devices that use the current password.
SubsonicTokenForm.disableSubsonicAccessWarning: This will completely disable access to the Subsonic API using from account.

SubscribeButton.authMessage: You need to be logged in to subscribe to this channel

UploadForm.licenseTip: Add a license to your upload to ensure some freedoms to your public.
UploadForm.noSpaceWarning: You don't have any space left to upload your files. Please contact the moderators.
UploadForm.pendingDraftsMessage: You have some draft uploads pending publication.
UploadForm.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your files here or open the browser to upload your files

ActionTable.contentUpdatedMessage: Content has been updated, click refresh to see up-to-date content
ActionTable.performActionConfirmation: Do you want to launch {action} on {count} element? | Do you want to launch {action} on {count} elements?
ActionTable.performActionWarning: This may affect a lot of elements or have irreversible consequences, please double check this is really what you want.
ActionTable.allElementsSelectedMessage: No elements selected | {count} element selected | All {count} elements selected
ActionTable.selectElementsMessage: Select one element | Select all {total} elements
ActionTable.actionSuccessMessage: Action {action} was launched successfully on {count} element | Action {action} was launched successfully on {count} elements

AttachmentInput.uploadHelp: PNG or JPG. Dimensions should be between 1400x1400px and 3000x3000px. Maximum file size allowed is 5MB.

DangerousButton.confirmAction: Do you want to confirm this action?

List.emptyState: No tracks have been added to your favorites yet

FetchButton.unsupportedDataMessage: The remote server answered, but returned data was unsupported by Funkwhale.
FetchButton.refreshSuccessMessage: Data was refreshed successfully from remote server.
FetchButton.refreshFailureMessage: An error occurred while trying to refresh data:
FetchButton.httpStatusMessage: The remote server answered with HTTP {status}
FetchButton.httpErrorMessage: An HTTP error occurred while contacting the remote server
FetchButton.timeoutErrorMessage: The remote server didn't respond quickly enough
FetchButton.connectionErrorMessage: Impossible to connect to the remote server
FetchButton.invalidJsonErrorMessage: The remote server returned invalid JSON or JSON-LD data
FetchButton.invalidAttributesErrorMessage: Data returned by the remote server had invalid or missing attributes
FetchButton.pendingRefreshMessage: The refresh request hasn't been processed in time by our server. It will be processed later.

FileUpload.deniedTooltip: Upload denied, ensure the file is not too big and that you have not reached your quota
FileUpload.serverTooltip: Cannot upload this file, ensure it is not too big
FileUpload.networkTooltip: A network error occurred while uploading this file
FileUpload.extensionTooltip: Invalid file type, ensure you are uploading an audio file. Supported file extensions are {extensions}
FileUpload.eventListenerMessage: This page is asking you to confirm that you want to leave - data you have entered may not be saved.
FileUpload.localUploadMessage: You are about to upload music to your library. Before proceeding, please ensure that:
FileUpload.localUploadCopyright: You are not uploading copyrighted content in a public library, otherwise you may be infringing the law
FileUpload.localUploadTag: The music files you are uploading are tagged properly.
FileUpload.localUploadPicardLink: We recommend using Picard for that purpose.
FileUpload.localUploadSupportedFormats: The music files you are uploading are in OGG, Flac, MP3 or AIFF format
FileUpload.uploadWidgetLabel: Click to select files to upload or drag and drop files or directories

ImportStatusModal.invalidMetadataMessage: The metadata included in the file is invalid or some mandatory fields are missing.
ImportStatusModal.importDetailMessage: Upload is still pending and will soon be processed by the server.
ImportStatusModal.importSuccessMessage: Upload was successfully processed by the server.
ImportStatusModal.importSkippedWarning: Upload was skipped because a similar one is already available in one of your libraries.
ImportStatusModal.importFailureMessage: An error occurred during upload processing. You will find more information below.
ImportStatusModal.documentationLink: Read our documentation for this error
ImportStatusModal.supportLink: Open a support thread (include the debug information below in your message)

AlbumsTable.searchPlaceholder: Search by domain, title, artist, MusicBrainz ID…

ArtistsTable.deleteActionConfirmation: The selected artist will be removed, as well as associated tracks, uploads, favorites and listening history. This action is irreversible.
ArtistsTable.searchPlaceholder: Search by domain, name, MusicBrainz ID…

LibrariesTable.deleteActionConfirmation: The selected library will be removed, as well as associated uploads and follows. This action is irreversible.

TagsTable.deleteActionConfirmation: The selected tag will be removed and unlinked with existing content, if any. This action is irreversible.

DomainsTable.allowListTitle: This domain is present in your allow-list

InstancePolicyForm.summaryHelp: Explain why you're applying this policy: this will help you remember why you added this rule. Depending on your pod configuration, this may be displayed publicly to help users understand the moderation rules in place.
InstancePolicyForm.isActiveHelp: Use this setting to temporarily enable/disable the policy without completely removing it.
InstancePolicyForm.blockAllHelp: Block everything from this account or domain. This will prevent any interaction with the entity, and purge related content (uploads, libraries, follows, etc.
InstancePolicyForm.silenceActivityHelp: Hide account or domain content, except from followers.
InstancePolicyForm.silenceNotificationsHelp: Prevent account or domain from triggering notifications, except from followers.
InstancePolicyForm.rejectMediaHelp: Hide account or domain content, except from followers.

InstancePolicyModal.entityRulesHeader: This entity is subject to specific moderation rules

NoteForm.summaryPlaceholder: Describe what actions have been taken, or any other related updates…

NotesThread.deleteModalMessage: The note will be deleted. This action is irreversible.

ReportCard.deleteModalMessage: This will delete the object associated with this report and mark the report as resolved. The deletion is irreversible.
ReportCard.objectDeletedWarning: The object associated with this report was deleted.

ReportModal.anonymousReportsDisabled: Anonymous reports are disabled, please sign-in to submit a report.
